company.name: PACKBN
company.factory: Di Trach Industrial Zone - Hoai Duc District, Hanoi

categories.name: Paper Cups
categories.description: Paper cups in various sizes from 3oz to 22oz, suitable for coffee, bubble tea and beverages
categories.longDescription: Our premium paper cups are designed to meet all your beverage needs - from hot espresso to iced bubble tea. With advanced manufacturing technology, PACKBN paper cups ensure absolute leak-proof, excellent insulation, and eco-friendliness. Available in sizes from 3oz to 22oz, suitable for all business types from small coffee shops to large chains.

benefits.title: 100% Leak-proof
benefits.description: Advanced PE coating technology prevents any leakage

benefits.title: Excellent Insulation
benefits.description: Maintains beverage temperature while protecting hands

benefits.title: Custom Printing
benefits.description: Support brand logo printing from 5,000 cups

categories.name: Paper Bowls
categories.description: Paper bowls for pho, salad, ice cream with sizes from 4oz to 36oz
categories.longDescription: PACKBN paper bowls are the perfect solution for hot dishes like pho, noodles, porridge, as well as salads and ice cream. Sturdy design with heat resistance up to 100°C, no deformation when containing hot food. Tight-fitting lids ensure no spillage during transport.

benefits.title: Heat Resistant to 100°C
benefits.description: Perfect for soups, pho, hot noodles

benefits.title: Convenient Lids
benefits.description: Tight fit, easy open/close, no spills

categories.name: Paper Straws
categories.description: Paper straws 6mm, 8mm, 12mm - perfect replacement for plastic straws
categories.longDescription: PACKBN paper straws are the perfect replacement for plastic straws, helping businesses reduce plastic waste and protect the environment. With 3-layer premium paper structure, straws won't get soggy in water for extended periods. Multiple sizes suitable for all types of beverages.

benefits.title: Individually Wrapped
benefits.description: Each straw individually wrapped for hygiene

categories.name: Food Containers
categories.description: Kraft paper boxes, plates and trays for hot and cold food
categories.longDescription: Kraft paper food containers are a sustainable packaging solution for the food industry. Sturdy design with convenient lids, perfect for take-away and delivery services. Natural unbleached Kraft material provides a friendly and professional feel.

benefits.title: Good Heat Retention
benefits.description: Suitable for hot and cold food

categories.name: Wooden Products
categories.description: Natural wooden cutlery - eco-friendly alternative to plastic disposables
categories.longDescription: PACKBN natural wooden utensils are made from premium birch wood, providing an elegant and eco-friendly dining experience. Smooth surface, no splinters, safe for users. Perfect for restaurants, hotels, and upscale events.

categories.name: Accessories
categories.description: Plant leaf cup carriers and eco-friendly accessories
